actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to establish the Foundation for International Scientific and Technological Cooperation, to provide for the management of the Foundation, and for other purposes.
short_title: Foundation for International Scientific and Technological Cooperation Act

summary.text: Foundation for International Scientific and Technological Cooperation Act - Establishes, as a Federal agency and corporation, the Foundation for International Scientific and Technological Cooperation to: (1) assist developing countries in strengthening their scientific and technological capabilities: (2) foster cooperation in research and development between developed and developing countries; and (3) coordinate its activities with other international development agencies. Sets forth the powers of such Foundation. Directs the Board to establish a Council of scientific, technology, and international affairs specialists to consult with the Foundation. Requires the Foundation to report annually to the Office of Science and Technology Policy and biennially to Congress.

titles.title: Foundation for International Scientific and Technological Cooperation Act
A bill to establish the Foundation for International Scientific and Technological Cooperation, to provide for the management of the Foundation, and for other purposes.
